content:
I’m Fatpa (aka 蔡胖) is an experienced edge network and observability developer, previously work with PCDN (Peer-to-peer CDN), specializing in Go and Python and currently learning Rust.
Now shifting focus toward AI-related research and development, and hope to become an AI Builder soon.
Feel free to exchange experiences and ideas related to research and development anytime. Touch me by i@fatpa.me.
summary:
